metadata.title: Cost-Benefit of Stockpiling Drugs for Influenza Pandemic

abstract.original_text: We analyzed strategies for the use of stockpiled antiviral drugs in the context of a future influenza pandemic and estimated cost-benefit ratios. Current stockpiling of oseltamivir appears to be cost-saving to the economy under several treatment strategies, including therapeutic treatment of patients and postexposure prophylactic treatment of patients' close contacts.

sentences.segment_text: We analyzed strategies for the use of stockpiled antiviral drugs in the context of a future influenza pandemic and estimated cost-benefit ratios .
Current stockpiling of oseltamivir appears to be cost-saving to the economy under several treatment strategies ,
including therapeutic treatment of patients and postexposure prophylactic treatment of patients ' close contacts .
